item.title: Viva La Fleur has launched online sales of its durable, all-natural floral arrangements
item.description:
Since its establishment in October 2013, Viva La Fleur Floral Boutique has impressed businesses with its enduring, all-natural floral arrangements and bouquets. The company holds the exclusive distribution rights for LavieFlo, a technology that makes flowers appear freshly cut for months, eliminating the need for water or sunlight. Sourced globally, fresh flowers from countries like Japan and China undergo a meticulous preservation process. This process substitutes the plant’s sap with a solution that retains the natural appearance and texture of the petals and leaves...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/viva-la-fleur-has-launched-online-sales-of-its-durable-all-natural-floral-arrangements/

item.title: Katamama will be opening its doors to guests in April
item.description:
Source: Katamama. A rooftop suite at dusk. Katamama, a 58-suite boutique hotel in Seminyak, Bali’s prime oceanfront area, is set to open in late March 2016. The hotel emphasizes “handcrafted hospitality,” with every detail meticulously designed and executed by skilled Indonesian artisans. Katamama is a project by PTT Family, known for acclaimed restaurants, bars, and the Potato Head Beach Club in Bali. This 20-villa estate is famous for its innovative environmental design and a prominent contemporary Indonesian art gallery...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/katamama-will-be-opening-its-doors-to-guests-in-april/

item.title: Cachet Hotel Group unveils the fresh appearance of URBN Shanghai
item.description:
The Cachet Hotel Group (CHG) has revamped its stylish URBN Hotel in Shanghai, a former warehouse. Led by CHG’s renowned fashion designer, Jay Godfrey, the updated interiors offer guests a modern, zen-like ambiance. The use of recycled and reclaimed wood materials adds a natural touch, further enhanced by the neutral color scheme. Source: CHG. The Jay Godfrey Courtyard Suite. Photo - http://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20140911/0861406560 The URBN Shanghai boasts a unique Jay Godfrey-designed suite...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cachet-hotel-group-unveils-the-fresh-appearance-of-urbn-shanghai/
